Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 11th overall pick, by Minnesota in 1965...
Injured on 5/31/1965 with a Strained Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 7/21/1969, off Dave a Roberts (CAL)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against California on 9/10/1969...
Hit first career homerun on 9/27/1969, off Ralph Terry (DET)...
Was selected to the 1970 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1971, hitting .380 with 3 HR, 22 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/6/1971, hitting .684 with 0 HR, 4 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Texas on 8/16/1972...
Was selected to the 1973 Allstar game...
Had 6 hits with 2 RBI against Oakland on 6/26/1975...
Was selected to the 1975 Allstar game...

Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Boston on 4/12/1977...
Won World Series with Minnesota in 1977...
Won World Series with Minnesota in 1978...
